text: Héctor Rodríguez is an equestrian from Colombia. Rodríguez competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics. He was born on 2 April 1936.Héctor Rodríguez == References == == Other websites == * Category:1936 births Category:Colombian equestrians Category:Dressage riders Category:Living people Category:Olympians for Colombia Category:Olympic equestrians for Colombia
title: Héctor Rodríguez
